duas.name: Morning Praise
duas.arabic_text: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
duas.description: Glory be to Allah and His praise
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah and His praise

duas.name: Morning Remembrance
duas.arabic_text: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: We have entered morning and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah

duas.name: Morning Protection
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can cause harm

duas.name: Ayatul Kursi Morning
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
duas.description: The verse of the throne for morning protection
duas.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining

duas.name: Three Quls Morning
duas.arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ...
duas.translation: Say: He is Allah, [who is] One...

duas.name: Sayyidul Istighfar
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You, You created me and I am Your servant, and I am faithful to my covenant and my promise as much as I can

duas.name: Evening Protection
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can cause harm

duas.name: Evening Remembrance
duas.arabic_text: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: We have entered evening and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah

duas.name: Ayatul Kursi Evening
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
duas.description: The verse of the throne for evening protection
duas.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining

duas.name: Three Quls Evening
duas.arabic_text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ...
duas.translation: Say: He is Allah, [who is] One...

duas.name: Evening Gratitude
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَمْسَى بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, whatever blessings I have received in this evening are from You

duas.name: Entering Masjid
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, open for me the gates of Your mercy

duas.name: Leaving Masjid
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You of Your bounty

duas.name: Before Wudu
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah

duas.name: After Wudu
duas.arabic_text: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
duas.translation: I bear witness that there is no deity worthy of worship except Allah alone, who has no partner

duas.name: After Adhan
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ
duas.description: Dua after hearing the call to prayer
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call

duas.name: Before Sleep
duas.arabic_text: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duas.translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live

duas.name: Waking Up
duas.arabic_text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after causing us to die and unto Him is the resurrection

duas.name: After Bad Dream
duas.arabic_text: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا رَأَيْتُ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan and from the evil of what I have seen

duas.name: After Good Dream
duas.arabic_text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي جَعَلَ رُؤْيَايَ خَيْرًا
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who made my dream good

duas.name: Tahajjud Prayer
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ نُورُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ
duas.translation: O Allah, all praise is for You. You are the Light of the heavens and the earth

duas.name: Daily Worship
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.description: Most comprehensive dua for daily worship
duas.translation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

duas.name: Sleep and Wake
duas.arabic_text: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duas.description: Main dua for sleep and waking
duas.translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live

duas.name: Protection
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can harm on earth or in heaven, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing

duas.name: Food and Sustenance
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.description: Main dua for food and sustenance
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in what You have provided us and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

duas.name: Travel and Journey
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
duas.translation: O Allah, we ask You on this journey of ours for righteousness, piety and deeds which please You

duas.name: Stress and Anxiety
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety, sorrow, weakness and laziness

duas.name: Home and Family
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
duas.translation: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and from my descendants. Our Lord, accept my supplication

duas.name: Knowledge and Study
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge

duas.name: Forgiveness
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
duas.translation: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers on the Day when the account is established

duas.name: Health and Wellbeing
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight

duas.name: Success and Guidance
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
duas.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task

duas.name: Marriage and Family
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
duas.description: Main dua for marriage and family
duas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us a leader for the righteous

duas.name: Work and Business
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duas.description: Main dua for work and business
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for pure sustenance, beneficial knowledge, and accepted deeds

duas.name: Quran and Dhikr
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ يَسِّرْ وَلَا تُعَسِّرْ، رَبِّ تَمِّمْ بِالْخَيْرِ
duas.translation: My Lord, make it easy and not difficult, my Lord, complete it with goodness

duas.name: Difficult Times
duas.arabic_text: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
duas.translation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs

duas.name: Social Relations
duas.arabic_text: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ
duas.translation: Peace be upon you and the mercy of Allah and His blessings

duas.name: Weather Related
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ عَلَى الآكَامِ وَالظِّرَابِ وَبُطُونِ الْأَوْدِيَةِ وَمَنَابِتِ الشَّجَرِ
duas.translation: O Allah, let it rain around us and not upon us. O Allah, let it rain on the hills, small mountains, valley bottoms, and places where trees grow

duas.name: Special Times
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.translation: O Allah, You are Most Forgiving, and You love forgiveness; so forgive me

duas.name: Against Evil Eye
duas.arabic_text: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah's perfect words from every devil and every poisonous reptile, and from every evil eye

duas.name: General Protection
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the decline of Your blessings, the change of Your protection, the sudden onset of Your punishment, and all Your displeasure

duas.name: Home Protection
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we rely

duas.name: Daily Protection
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can cause harm on earth or in heaven

duas.name: Protection from Harm
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ
duas.description: Protection from all types of harm
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can harm

duas.name: Before Eating
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَعَلَى بَرَكَةِ اللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah and with the blessings of Allah

duas.name: After Eating
duas.arabic_text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.translation: All praise is for Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any might or power on my part

duas.name: Guest's Dua for Host
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِيمَا رَزَقْتَهُمْ، وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ
duas.description: Dua when eating at someone's house
duas.translation: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided them, forgive them and have mercy on them

duas.name: Breaking Fast
duas.arabic_text: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
duas.translation: The thirst has gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills

duas.name: Increase in Provision
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, pure sustenance, and accepted deeds

duas.name: Starting Journey
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. Glory be to Him Who has subjected this to us, for we could never have accomplished it by ourselves

duas.name: Entering Vehicle
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, all praise is for Allah

duas.name: Returning Home
duas.arabic_text: آيِبُونَ تَائِبُونَ عَابِدُونَ لِرَبِّنَا حَامِدُونَ
duas.translation: We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord

duas.name: Travel Protection
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى، وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
duas.translation: O Allah, we ask You on this journey of ours for righteousness, piety and deeds which please You

duas.name: Entering New Place
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذِهِ الْقَرْيَةِ وَخَيْرَ أَهْلِهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ أَهْلِهَا
duas.description: Dua when entering a new place
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the good of this place and the good of its people, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil of its people

duas.name: Remove Worry
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
duas.description: Dua to remove anxiety and worry
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow

duas.name: Ease Difficulty
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا
duas.translation: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy

duas.name: Relief from Sadness
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي عَبْدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant

duas.name: Relief from Debt
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.description: Dua for relief from debt burden
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful instead of what is unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You

duas.name: Peace of Heart
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الثَّبَاتَ فِي الْأَمْرِ، وَالْعَزِيمَةَ عَلَى الرُّشْدِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in my affairs and determination in following the right path

duas.name: For Parents
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا
duas.translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small

duas.name: For Spouse
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِي أَهْلِي
duas.description: Dua for spouse and marital harmony
duas.translation: O Allah, bless my family for me

duas.name: For Children
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ دِينِي وَأَمَانَتِي وَخَوَاتِيمَ عَمَلِي
duas.description: Dua for children's protection and guidance
duas.translation: O Allah, I entrust to You my religion, my trusts, and the last of my deeds

duas.name: Entering Home
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust

duas.name: Leaving Home
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah

duas.name: Increase Knowledge
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge

duas.name: Memory Improvement
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي
duas.translation: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me and teach me what will benefit me

duas.name: Study Success
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
duas.translation: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish

duas.name: General Forgiveness
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Ever-Accepting of repentance, the Most Merciful

duas.name: Major Sins
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
duas.description: Dua for forgiveness of all sins
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, first and last, open and secret

duas.name: Sincere Repentance
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness for what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future

duas.name: Seeking Mercy
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.description: Dua for seeking mercy in both worlds
duas.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world what is good and in the Hereafter what is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

duas.name: General Health
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي
duas.description: Dua for general health and wellbeing
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body, O Allah, grant me health in my hearing, O Allah, grant me health in my sight

duas.name: Healing
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ، اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
duas.translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal, for You are the Healer, and there is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no disease

duas.name: Pain Relief
duas.arabic_text: أَعُوذُ بِعِزَّةِ اللَّهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah's might and power from the evil of what I feel and fear

duas.name: Seeking Guidance
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي وَسَدِّدْنِي
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me and lead me to the right path

duas.name: Decision Making
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ، وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge, and I seek ability by Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty

duas.name: Success in Affairs
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
duas.description: Dua for success in all affairs
duas.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task

duas.name: Steadfastness
duas.arabic_text: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duas.translation: O Turner of hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion

duas.name: Righteous Path
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنَا فِيمَنْ هَدَيْتَ
duas.description: Dua for staying on the right path
duas.translation: O Allah, guide us among those whom You have guided

duas.name: Seeking Marriage
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ
duas.description: Dua for seeking a righteous spouse
duas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes

duas.name: Marital Harmony
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمَا، وَبَارِكْ عَلَيْهِمَا، وَاجْمَعْ بَيْنَهُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
duas.translation: O Allah, bless them both, and bestow blessings upon them, and unite them in goodness

duas.name: Righteous Children
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
duas.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication

duas.name: Work Success
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ أَعِنِّي وَلَا تُعِنْ عَلَيَّ
duas.translation: My Lord, help me and do not help against me

duas.name: Business Barakah
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي بَيْعِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي شِرَائِنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, bless our selling and bless our buying

duas.name: Debt Payment
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful instead of what is unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You

duas.name: Honest Dealings
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخِيَانَةِ فَإِنَّهَا بِئْسَتِ الْبِطَانَةُ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from dishonesty, for it is indeed an evil inner trait

duas.name: Workplace Harmony
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ
duas.translation: O Allah, rectify all my affairs

duas.name: Before Quran
duas.arabic_text: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan

duas.name: After Quran
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ ارْحَمْنِي بِالْقُرْآنِ وَاجْعَلْهُ لِي إِمَامًا وَنُورًا وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً
duas.translation: O Allah, have mercy on me through the Quran, and make it for me a leader, light, guidance and mercy

duas.name: Quran Memorization
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ عَلِّمْنِي مِنْهُ مَا جَهِلْتُ وَذَكِّرْنِي مِنْهُ مَا نُسِّيتُ
duas.translation: O Allah, teach me what I do not know of it and remind me of what I have forgotten of it

duas.name: Understanding Quran
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
duas.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease my task for me, and remove the impediment from my speech so they may understand my speech

duas.name: Daily Dhikr
duas.arabic_text: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.translation: Glory be to Allah and His praise, glory be to Allah the Most Great

duas.name: During Hardship
duas.arabic_text: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

duas.name: During Calamity
duas.arabic_text: إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
duas.translation: Indeed, we belong to Allah, and indeed, to Him we will return. O Allah, reward me for my affliction and compensate me with something better

duas.name: Financial Difficulty
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ وَالْقِلَّةِ وَالذِّلَّةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity and humiliation

duas.name: Emotional Distress
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety, sorrow, weakness and laziness

duas.name: Seeking Help
duas.arabic_text: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
duas.translation: Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs

duas.name: Meeting Others
duas.arabic_text: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ
duas.translation: Peace be upon you and the mercy of Allah and His blessings

duas.name: Parting Others
duas.arabic_text: أَسْتَوْدِعُ اللَّهَ دِينَكَ وَأَمَانَتَكَ وَخَوَاتِيمَ عَمَلِكَ
duas.translation: I entrust to Allah your religion, your trusts and your final deeds

duas.name: Reconciliation
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ ذَاتَ بَيْنِنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, reconcile between us

duas.name: Good Character
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي لِأَحْسَنِ الْأَخْلَاقِ لَا يَهْدِي لِأَحْسَنِهَا إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me to the best of manners for none can guide to the best of them but You

duas.name: Avoiding Conflict
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ جَنِّبْنِي مُنْكَرَاتِ الْأَخْلَاقِ وَالْأَعْمَالِ وَالْأَهْوَاءِ
duas.translation: O Allah, keep me away from evil character, deeds and desires

duas.name: When It Rains
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّبًا نَافِعًا
duas.translation: O Allah, make it a beneficial rain

duas.name: Thunder & Lightning
duas.arabic_text: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ
duas.translation: Glory be to Him Whom thunder glorifies His praise, and the angels out of fear of Him

duas.name: Strong Winds
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for its good and seek refuge in You from its evil

duas.name: Seeking Rain
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثًا مُغِيثًا مَرِيئًا مَرِيعًا نَافِعًا غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ عَاجِلًا غَيْرَ آجِلٍ
duas.translation: O Allah, send us rain that will be a source of mercy and not a source of harm, swiftly and not delayed

duas.name: Extreme Weather
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, let it pass around us and not upon us

duas.name: Start of Ramadan
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي رَجَبٍ وَشَعْبَانَ وَبَلِّغْنَا رَمَضَانَ
duas.description: Dua at the start of Ramadan
duas.translation: O Allah, bless us in Rajab and Sha'ban, and let us reach Ramadan

duas.name: Laylatul Qadr
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.translation: O Allah, You are Most Forgiving, and You love forgiveness; so forgive me

duas.name: Eid Prayer
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
duas.translation: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, there is no deity worthy of worship except Allah

duas.name: Islamic New Year
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الْأَبَدِيُّ الْقَدِيمُ الْأَوَّلُ، وَعَلَى فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ وَكَرَمِكَ الْمُعَوَّلُ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are the Eternal, the Ancient, the First, and upon Your immense grace and generosity do we depend

duas.name: Friday Special Times
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَاهْدِنِي وَعَافِنِي وَارْزُقْنِي
duas.description: Dua for special times on Friday
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, give me good health and provide for me

duas.name: Starting Activity
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah

duas.name: Dressing/Undressing
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
duas.description: Dua when putting on or taking off clothes
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, besides whom there is none worthy of worship

duas.name: Looking in Mirror
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
duas.description: Dua when looking in the mirror
duas.translation: O Allah, as You have made my appearance beautiful, make my character beautiful as well

duas.name: Market/Shopping
duas.arabic_text: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ
duas.translation: There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah alone, who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He gives life and causes death

duas.name: Daily Errands
duas.arabic_text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ
duas.description: Dua for protection during daily tasks
duas.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah

duas.name: Seeking Spouse
duas.arabic_text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
duas.description: Dua for finding a righteous spouse
duas.translation: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a pure offspring

duas.name: Marriage Blessing
duas.arabic_text: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
duas.translation: May Allah bless you and shower His blessings upon you, and may He unite both of you in goodness

duas.name: Spouse Harmony
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَلِّفْ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِنَا
duas.translation: O Allah, unite our hearts

duas.name: Family Unity
duas.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ
duas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes

duas.name: Relationship Strength
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ حُبَّكَ أَحَبَّ إِلَيَّ مِنْ نَفْسِي وَأَهْلِي
duas.translation: O Allah, make Your love more beloved to me than myself and my family

duas.name: Physical Strength
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter

duas.name: Protection from Illness
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, and all diseases

duas.name: Better Understanding
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ فَقِّهْنِي فِي الدِّينِ
duas.translation: O Allah, give me understanding of the religion

duas.name: Sayyidul Istighfar
duas.arabic_text: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant
